member.name: T:LD.Common.WebApi.Swagger.CustomHeaderParameter
member.summary: Operation filter for Swagger UI to add a custom header parameter

member.name: P:LD.Common.WebApi.Swagger.CustomHeaderParameter.Filter
member.summary: Function which will be called with each api description Return true to add the header to the swagger operation

member.name: P:LD.Common.WebApi.Swagger.CustomHeaderParameter.Description
member.summary: User friendly description of the header

member.name: P:LD.Common.WebApi.Swagger.CustomHeaderParameter.Key
member.summary: A unique identifier for the header (auto set to guid)

member.name: P:LD.Common.WebApi.Swagger.CustomHeaderParameter.Default
member.summary: Default pre-filled value for the header

member.name: M:LD.Common.WebApi.Swagger.CustomHeaderParameter.Apply(Swashbuckle.Application.SwaggerDocsConfig)
member.summary: Apply header config to a full configuration

member.name: M:LD.Common.WebApi.Swagger.CustomHeaderParameter.Apply(Swashbuckle.Swagger.Operation,Swashbuckle.Swagger.SchemaRegistry,System.Web.Http.Description.ApiDescription)
member.summary: Apply header config to a specific operation
